text: Walter C. "Wally" Pfister (born July 8, 1961) is an Academy Award-winning American cinematographer and movie director who is known for his cinematography in Batman Begins, Memento, Moneyball, Insomnia, The Dark Knight, Inception, and in The Dark Knight Rises. He began his directing career in the 2014 movie Transcendence. Pfister was born on July 8, 1961 in Chicago, Illinois. He was raised both in Chicago and in New York City, New York. Pfister was married to Anna Julien since 1992. They had three children. ==References== ==Other websites== *A Conversation with Wally Pfister * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Academy Award winning cinematographers Category:American cinematographers Category:Movie directors from Chicago Category:Movie directors from New York City
title: Wally Pfister
